= XML Utils =

a library to ease the daily work on XML documents. This library is used by [bives:wiki BiVeS], [bives-core:wiki BiVeS-Core], [bives-cellml:wiki BiVeS-CellML], [bives-sbml:wiki BiVeS-SBML].

== Features ==
* pretty print, see HowTo#Printing
* hash sums => identification
* entails comparison, see bives:wiki

== Usage ==
* [http://bin.sems.uni-rostock.de/xmlutils/ download a binary]
* include XMLUtils via Maven: ([http://mvn.sems.uni-rostock.de/releases/de/unirostock/sems/xmlutils/ find latest version id], import the [https://sems.uni-rostock.de/2013/10/maven-repository/ SEMS Maven repository])
{{{
#!xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>de.unirostock.sems</groupId>
    <artifactId>xmlutils</artifactId>
    <version>$VERSION</version>
</dependency>
}}}
* learn HowTo use the library
